system.description:
Magic and martial skill have never existed to the complete exclusion of one another; just ask a herald. But practitioners of Cutting Omen take the practice further, blending magical energies and effects with raw martial skill to create a uniquely-deadly whole. Cutting Omen practitioners are all spellcasters; they need to be in order to use this school’s techniques, which often require a certain amount of stored magical energy on the part of the practitioner.

Important Note: Cutting Omen maneuvers often require a certain amount of unspent magical energy to function. This is notated with the "Requirement" line. If the requirement is not met, the maneuver cannot be used at that time.

Despite these requirements, Cutting Omen maneuvers are not spells. They are no more susceptible to effects like dispel magic or counterspell than a Herald’s Divine Smite or the breath weapon of a dragon.

Using Cutting Omen With Other Material

Cutting Omen is designed to work with fighting spellcasters who have access to both maneuvers and spell slots. Right now, the only class that qualifies without a specialized archetype is the herald, and it uses spell slots to acquire its exertion. You can make this available to heralds, certainly, but it’s better for multi-classed warrior/spellcaster types. In particular, characters with the Blade Dancer synergy feat chain should have access to it. Consider adding access to this tradition as an optional benefit of the Blade Dancer feat.

Cutting Omen Maneuvers

Magic, Resourcefulness, Versatility

Prerequisite: Spellcasting or Pact Magic class feature

Fighting spellcasters often learn both disciplines to give themselves additional options in a fight, so it should not be surprising that one learned to use untapped magical energy to enhance their skill at arms and taught others the same.

Cutting Omen practitioners use these techniques to “stretch” their magic, siphoning small amounts of stored power to enhance their combat prowess without spending it outright.

  • Infused Strike (2 points)

    1st degree Cutting Omen action

    Requirement: Unused spell slot of 1st level or higher or at least 2 unspent spell points

    You infuse your weapon with latent magical energy and strike with it.

  • Martial Caster Stance (1 point)

    1st degree Cutting Omen bonus action (stance)

    You steel your resolve and draw on your supernatural power, readying yourself for the battle to come.

  • Forceful Defense (1 point)

    1st degree Cutting Omen reaction

    Requirement: Unused spell slot of 1st level or higher or at least 2 unspent spell points

    You respond to an incoming attack with a blast of magical force, driving your opponent back.

  • Magical Reserves (special)

    1st degree Cutting Omen bonus action

    You draw upon the strength of your resolve to replenish your magical reserves, albeit at a cost.

  • Accursed Strike (2 points)

    2nd degree Cutting Omen action

    Requirement: Unused spell slot of 1st level or higher or at least 2 unspent spell points

    You whisper fell imprecations over your weapon and ready yourself to curse your foes as you wound them.

  • Transform Weapon (2 points)

    2nd degree Cutting Omen bonus action

    Requirement: Unused spell slot of 1st level or higher or at least 2 unspent spell points

    You transform your weapon into something more immediately useful.

  • Spellcaster’s Jab (1 point)

    2nd degree Cutting Omen bonus action

    You have learned to flow straight out of the motions of a spell into a weapon attack.

  • Ethereal Strike (2 points)

    3rd degree Cutting Omen action

    Requirement: Unused spell slot of 2nd level or higher or at least 3 unspent spell points, spell from the movement or teleportation schools available to cast.

    You vanish and reappear next to your target, catching them off guard.

  • Dissipating Counter (special)

    3rd degree Cutting Omen reaction

    Requirement: Unused spell slot of 3rd level or higher or at least 5 unspent spell points, spell from the abjuration school available to cast.

    You weave a quick warding symbol with your weapon, cutting hostile magic out of the air.

  • Battle Mage Stance (1 point)

    4th degree Cutting Omen bonus action (stance)

    Prerequisites: Extra Attack

    You call upon your latent magical power to infuse your weapon attacks.

  • Penetrating Strike (2 points)

    4th degree Cutting Omen action

    Requirement: Unused spell slot of 3rd level or higher or at least 5 unspent spell points, spell from the conjuration school available to cast.

    You call upon your magical abilities to pass through an enemy’s defenses as if they were not there.

  • Willful Resilience (3 points)

    5th degree Cutting Omen bonus action

    Requirement: Unused spell slot of 3rd level or higher or at least 5 unspent spell points, spell from the abjuration school available to cast.

    You summon your will to purge harmful effects from yourself.

  • Absorb Energy (3 points)

    5th degree Cutting Omen bonus reaction

    Requirement: Unused spell slot of 4th level or higher or at least 6 unspent spell points, spell from the abjuration school available to cast.

    You can absorb some of the magical energy of spells cast on you for your own purposes.
